description: For full-bodied entertainment on the go, the Philips GoGear Ariaz 8 GB MP3 player (SA2ARA08K/17) utilizes proprietary FullSound technology to deliver rich, detailed audio, and handles video and image files with ease. Compact and easy to use, the Ariaz also offers audio recording capabilities, extended battery life, and FM radio. The included headphones partner with this player to deliver a pristine listening experience.GoGear Ariaz 8 GB MP3 Player (Gunmetal) SA2ARA08K/17At a glance:FullSound technology delivers rich, detailed audio8 GB memory holds 1800 songsFM radio with RDS and 20 presets2.4-inch full-color displayExtended battery life offers up to 45 hours of listening per chargePlays MP3, WAV, WMA, FLAC, APE, JPG, BMP, WMV and MJPEG files directly
title: Philips GoGear Ariaz 8 GB MP3 Player (Silver)
